channel.title: Which files a program accessed?
channel.description: I can see it from apparmor output, with terminal opening enter tail -f /var/log/audit/audit.log, but I don't like its output format, too small fonts because showing too many things in the window, how to only show the simple things or any other sugestions?

item.title: Which files a program accessed?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As per:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

  • Konsole font can be increased. Hold ctrl then spin your mouse wheel.
  • Or open that file with an editor of your choice that can also modify font sizes and whatnot.

Read full topic
